channel.title: Totem on Victor Toso
channel.description: Recent content in Totem on Victor Toso

item.title: GSoC Report #4 and #5
item.description: Hey :) I usually write my posts in the weekend when I do have more time to think about what I’ve done and what It is interesting to share. Sadly, two weekends ago I was ill due something I’ve eaten and now I’ll try to summarize two weeks in one post! The TVDB Is now upstream. Yay! The main care after implementing the cache with Gom was handling multiple requests of the same TV Show in a short period of time (concurrency).
